name: hk-tourism-ai-platform
description: Hong Kong Tourism AI Platform - Personalized tourism experience with AI recommendations

scripts.dev:services: docker-compose up --build api-gateway user-service recommendation-service location-service event-service mongodb redis
scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: concurrently "cd backend/api-gateway && npm run build" "cd backend/services/user-service && npm run build"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: concurrently "cd backend/api-gateway && npm test" "cd backend/services/user-service && npm test"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: concurrently "cd backend/api-gateway && npm run lint" "cd shared/types && npm run lint"
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.install:all: concurrently "cd frontend/mobile && npm install" "cd frontend/web && npm install" "cd backend/api-gateway && npm install" "cd backend/services/user-service && npm install" "cd backend/services/location-service && npm install" "cd backend/services/event-service && npm install" "cd shared/types && npm install"

author: Hong Kong Tourism Board
